Statute.Title: Income Tax Amendments Act, 2000
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Impôt sur le revenu, Loi de 2000 modifiant l’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2001, c. 17 in force on assent 14.06.2001 see also various coming into force provisions throughout
CIF, 2013, c. 34, ss. 24 and 25 deemed to have come into force 14.06.2001
